text: Mba tugivigen mba Zisas farasegi ŋaara gumgi mba ŋaara mbuim, mba Fhe Bakɨme buni khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, mben vhɨrve guigira vhɨrkɨvgi. Mbe vhɨrkɨvgiap, mba Grik kama nzuai ntɨɨri, mbe Aram kama nzuai ntɨɨri phorga vhegi. Mbe mbe vhegap khaŋ nzuai, “Nde rari tugɨra tɨgap zazera mban mba mba tivgi gumgi gu mbigir kurkurav, nde mban nzan mani rimgi mbigir kurkurigi fhuvara.” 6.1 Araman kam, ana Zudia gum Gariri fhain ki gumgi gu mbigi nzuai kam ma. Ana maneŋ bisanera Hibruin kama fara muuŋgi.
